image.description: A crystal ball with a computer mouse inside
A person meditating on top of a giant keyboard
A tarot card spread with tech icons instead of traditional symbols
A confused person tangled in ethernet cables like a puppet
A fortune cookie with binary code spilling out instead of a paper slip
A computer screen showing a blue screen of death with the text 'Your aura needs debugging'
A person in a wizard robe waving a USB stick like a wand
A ouija board with computer keys instead of letters
A tech support hotline operator wearing a turban and gazing into a crystal ball
A random image of a cactus in a desert with the text 'In Conclusion' overlaid
